activities: Moov Corporation ("Moovweb") offers a SaaS or cloud based platform that allows companies and developers to transform their web assets from desktop to mobile devices. The Moovweb platform is a leading software platform for responsive delivery of such sites. User personal information is not captured as part of this transformation process. Rather, data is transmitted via the platform versus stored by the platform. The Company's platform is currently served by Amazon Web Services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
